column2: Halfling commanders lead with hope in one hand and the promise of food in the other. It is surprisingly effective.
Esteemed figures in Halfling society, the Fieldwardens keep the Moot safe from threats inside and outside.
Master Chefs are the greatest cooks in Halfling society, which might as well mean that they are its high priests.
Halfling Sheriffs are both local militia leaders and law enforcement... for most of their time.
